bibl.title: Count Ausonius.
bibl.note: Correction of P.L.R.E. I, 622: Ausonius Nemesianus 3. - If the comes Ausonius (S.P.P. XX, 111) and the praeses Augustamnicae Flavius Iulius Ausonius are one and the same, one may wonder whether Flavius Iulius Ausonius is identical to the only other Iulius Ausonius of high rank known from the fourth century, namely the father of the well-known professor, poet, praetorian prefect, and consul.
bibl.seg: Correction of P.L.R.E. I, 622: Ausonius Nemesianus 3. - If the comes Ausonius (S.P.P. XX, 111) and the praeses Augustamnicae Flavius Iulius Ausonius are one and the same, one may wonder whether Flavius Iulius Ausonius is identical to the only other Iulius Ausonius of high rank known from the fourth century, namely the father of the well-known professor, poet, praetorian prefect, and consul.
